<t>barhiRabarhApIqaH suziraparo[^1] bAlavallavo gozWe .

mude'sO DIrARAM na guRalavagarvAnmama[^3] pari-

ito ye sAsUyA anfjumatayo nUtanatayA

SrImat<b>sarvAnando</b> vandyaGawIyArtiharaputraH ..
yadyapi santyatiguRinaH SramastaTApyatra mama hi mOKaryAt .
lalitaM rOti pikaSced vAgyAmo yAtu kiM kAkaH ..</t>

;p{0009}
<t>amarAdayaH zaqviMSatiH <b>sAmAnyadevatAyAm .</b> maraRaM maraH . ‘mfN‍prARatyAge’ .
bahulavacanAd BAve ap . ezAM tannAstItyamarAH . etacca ‘naYo (jva? ja)ramaramitra-

taTAhi SrIrAmAyaRe–

dIvyantIti devAH . pacAdyac . janmasattAvinASAtmikAstisro[^4] daSA ezAmiti

prasavESvaryayoH’ . ‘susUDAgfDiByaH kran’ (u. 2. 24) . surA ezAmastIti
